info.title: Siputzx API
info.description: A versatile API server with a wide range of endpoints, including AI-powered services, anime content scraping, file downloads, and Cloudflare AI integrations.

tags.name: AI
tags.description: AI-powered endpoints that provide access to various language and vision models.

tags.name: Anime
tags.description: Endpoints for fetching information about anime and manga from various sources.

tags.name: APK
tags.description: Endpoints for searching and retrieving information about Android APK files.

tags.name: Cloudflare AI
tags.description: Endpoints that leverage Cloudflare's AI infrastructure for various tasks.

tags.name: Currency
tags.description: Endpoints for currency exchange rates and cryptocurrency prices.

tags.name: Downloader
tags.description: Endpoints to download media from various social media platforms.

tags.name: News
tags.description: Endpoints for fetching the latest news from various Indonesian news outlets.

get.summary: Returns a simple 'Hello, World!' message.
get.description: A simple endpoint to check if the API is running.

200.description: Successful response

get.summary: Get answers from the Bible.
get.description: This endpoint uses AI to answer questions based on the Bible. You can specify the translation to be used.

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: The question you want to ask.

schema.example: What is the meaning of life?

parameters.name: translation
parameters.description: The Bible translation to use.

200.description: Successful response

get.summary: Get a response from the Felo AI model.
get.description: This endpoint provides access to the Felo AI model.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query or prompt for the Felo AI.

200.description: Successful response

get.summary: Get a response from the Gemini-Lite model.
get.description: This endpoint provides access to Google's Gemini-Lite model. It can process both text and image inputs.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: The text prompt for the model.

schema.example: What is the capital of Indonesia?

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The specific Gemini model to use.

parameters.name: imgUrl
parameters.description: URL of an image to be processed by the model.

200.description: Successful response

get.summary: Search for anime on Anichin.
get.description: Searches for anime on anichin.cafe based on a query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query.

200.description: A list of anime matching the search query.

get.summary: Search for anime on Auratail.
get.description: Searches for anime on auratail.vip based on a query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query.

200.description: A list of anime matching the search query.

get.summary: Search for manga on Komikindo.
get.description: Searches for manga on komikindo.cz based on a query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query.

200.description: A list of manga matching the search query.

get.summary: Search for anime on Oploverz.
get.description: Searches for anime on oploverz.org based on a query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query.

200.description: A list of anime matching the search query.

get.summary: Search for anime on Otakudesu.
get.description: Searches for anime on otakudesu.cloud based on a query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query.

200.description: A list of anime matching the search query.

get.summary: Search for an APK on an1.com.
get.description: Searches for an APK on an1.com based on a query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query for the APK.

200.description: A list of APKs matching the search query.

get.summary: Search for an APK on openapk.net.
get.description: Searches for an APK on openapk.net based on a query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query for the APK.

200.description: A list of APKs matching the search query.

get.summary: Search for an app on the Google Play Store.
get.description: Searches for an app on play.google.com based on a query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query for the app.

200.description: A list of apps matching the search query.

get.summary: Generate an image from a text prompt.
get.description: Uses Cloudflare's AI to generate an image based on a textual description.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: The text prompt to generate the image from.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The specific model to use for generation.

200.description: The generated image.

get.summary: Convert between currencies.
get.description: Converts an amount from one currency to another.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount to convert.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The currency to convert from.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The currency to convert to.

200.description: The converted amount.

get.summary: Get the price of a cryptocurrency.
get.description: Retrieves the current price of a cryptocurrency specified by its symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The symbol of the cryptocurrency.

200.description: The current price of the cryptocurrency.

get.summary: Download a video from Snack Video.
get.description: Downloads a video from the provided Snack Video URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the Snack Video to download.

200.description: The downloaded video file.

get.summary: Download a video from Twitter.
get.description: Downloads a video from the provided Twitter URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the Twitter video to download.

200.description: The downloaded video file.

get.summary: Get the latest news from Antara News.
get.description: Fetches the latest news articles from Antara News.

200.description: A list of the latest news articles.

get.description: Fetches the latest news articles from CNBC Indonesia.

200.description: A list of the latest news articles.
